body_html:
I have the same problem when I try to restore a graph trained on a different machine, although it works on the same machine.
More precisely, I get
KeyError: 'VariableV2'
on the tf.train.import_meta_graph

tf.reset_default_graph()

with tf.Session() as sess:

    # Restore graph
    saver = tf.train.import_meta_graph(model_filename_path)

    saver.restore(sess, path_to_ckpt)
body_text:
I have the same problem when I try to restore a graph trained on a different machine, although it works on the same machine.
More precisely,  I get
KeyError: 'VariableV2'
on the tf.train.import_meta_graph
tf.reset_default_graph()

with tf.Session() as sess:

    # Restore graph
    saver = tf.train.import_meta_graph(model_filename_path)

    saver.restore(sess, path_to_ckpt)
body:
I have the same problem when I try to restore a graph trained on a different machine, although it works on the same machine.
More precisely,  I get
`KeyError: 'VariableV2'`
on the tf.train.import_meta_graph

    tf.reset_default_graph()

    with tf.Session() as sess:

        # Restore graph
        saver = tf.train.import_meta_graph(model_filename_path)

        saver.restore(sess, path_to_ckpt)
